summary.span: Provides a collection of methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo è simile alla chiamata al metodo sull'interfaccia che rappresenta questa istanza di runtime.This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime. La tabella seguente mostra le combinazioni supportate per `clsid` e `riid`.The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`. |`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntimeCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHostCLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHostIID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHostCLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (non è valido per common language runtime fornito dal [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactoryCLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactoryIID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongNameCLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongNameIID_CLRStrongName| è simile al (metodo). is similar to the method.
